name: AASRA (ASSOCIATION FOR ACTIVE SERVICE IN RURAL AREAS)
briefDescription: Association For Active Service In Rural Areas is located in Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh.AASRA is an NGO working in the areas of Agriculture, Income Generation, Capacity building, Drinking Water and Sanitation and Health in coastal districts of Andhra Pradesh state of India. Presently working with the help of National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development, Agriculture Technology Management Agency, National Council for Science and Technology Communication, department of science and Technology- government of India, WASSAN, Agriculture Department of Andhra Pradesh and Animal Husbandry department of Andhrapradesh. AASRA is helping the poorest of the poor sections like Tribal, Fisher men, Small and marginal farmers, Rural poor and women.
